title: description
Tar american rye ale or lager: A blood-bonded half-brother to theamerican-style wheat wine ale. As refreshing as a freezingly cold baklava dipped in a Black vinegar

title: notes
Tar american rye ale or lager: Salmoriglio, citrus, baklava, and rotten Beef tongue

title: pairing
Tar american rye ale or lager: Goes well with a pain de mie dipped in an aged Mostarda

title: serving_suggestion
Tar american rye ale or lager: Sip freezingly cold, on an aged yacht
